messages.subject: Mystery Shopper Wanted____brdp3_____customer service
messages.body:
MYSTERY SHOPPER WANTED
EARN NO LESS THAN
$ 300.00
Need extra INCOME!
Become our :
Earn  Per Venture:
It is Very Easy and Very Simple:
No Application fees:


Here's your chance to get paid for shopping and dinning out.
Your job will be to evaluate and comment on customer service in a wide Variety of shops,Stores, restaurant and services in your area.
Mystery shoppers are Needed Throughout America .Canada and The Uk


You'll be paid to shop and dine out-plus,you can also get free meals, Free merchandise, Free services, free Entertainment, Free travel and more.
Great Pay. Fun Work. Flexible Schedules.No experience required. If you can shop-you are qualified!


Let me explain to you what it entails


What is a mystery shopper?


A mystery shopper is like being 007 at the mall. Mystery shoppers must complete their assignments and go un-detected. Mystery Shoppers receive assignments consisting of a variety of business types such as: restaurants, food chains, automobile dealerships, retail stores, and more.


Businesses benefit from the services of a mystery shopper because they report their unbiased review from a customer standpoint. This enables the business to identify problems that could result in a unhappy customer and loss of sales. As you can see, mystery shoppers have a great responsibility and are paid accordingly.


As a Mystery Shopper you can:
earn up to $300 per assignment
have a flexible schedule and hours
pick and choose what assignments you want
bring your kids with you on assignments.
work part time or full time.
get free merchandise
get paid for dining out
stay at hotels for free
get paid for going to the movies
and much more...


We will be sending you cheques for any of your assignments which you will cash at your financial institution and you use the money to carry out the assignment . You do not have to use any money from your pockets. So We will provide you the money for all your assignments.


What you need to do is to contact the email below
hub_duke2000009@yahoo.com.hk
The following information below will be needed :


Full Name:
Address (no Po Box):
City:
State:
Zip code:
Phone Number(s):
Email Address:
Age:
Occupation:


We look forward to working with you

 
 
Huber Duke

messages.body:
Subject:^(your response is needed to get started}??_GET READY FOR
YOUR FIRST MYSTERY SHOPPING ASSIGNMENT


Hello Arnold Wanker


Greetings to you once again  Mystery Shopper Representative


   The Mystery Shopper Organization is solemnly happy for the turn up made by you in applying as a Mystery Shopper Representative in your area and all details you sent to us in your first email has been filed and passed on to the database management department for updates on your first mystery shopper assignment


Your information has been received  and will be recorded.  There is an assignment in your area now.  Here are the details for the assignment.


You are to shop at Wal-Mart but different one this time around and give a report on customer service, quality of product, and cleanliness of the establishment, because we really want to close up some walmart store and we have been reported several times for slow services, customer service and unbalanced exchange rate. It is now your duty to carry out the fund transfer at any various location of your choice and balance the reports in order to curtail these lapses 
 that . I hope there is a Wal-Mart store in your area. Money will be provided for you to shop.


Remember***Your survey is to shop at any Wal-Mart location of your choice and you are to give a report on


I)How long it took you to complete the shopping and report on service, quality of product
ii) Name of the agent / his or her attitude towards customers.
iii)Poor working skills and customer relation
iv) Slow services and cleanliness of the establishment.


We are going to send you a payment for the assignments this week. You are not to use any money from your pocket and You will also be paid a commission of $300 for your assignments


Note: PLEASE ALWAYS MAKE SURE YOU ARE ALWAYS BY YOUR PHONE TO ANSWER IT AND ALSO CHECKING YOUR EMAILS REGULARLY. BECAUSE THIS JOBS NEEDS COMMUNICATION.


LASTLY***Our aim is to established and help customer obtain a better understanding of their positioning and there right  in the market place and also note that there are over 750 mystery shopping companies out there, and we strive to be the best.  Year after year, we have been awarded top honors for the services we provide.


Please get back to me if you are ready to carry out the assignment and also i will be emailin g you the instructions on how to carry out your first assignment.


Note***you are advice to respond to this email, stating  that you are ready to carry out your assignment so that you can receive your first assignment.


Hope all is clear?


I will await your immediate response and payment for the assignment can be forwarded immediately.


We look forward in working with you
Hubert Duke

messages.body:
Hi Hubert,


Sounds like a plan. Like I said in my last mesage, I aint alowed in the Walmart on Bell Road any more after what hapened last month. There all idiots in there cuz I ofered to buy the jar of Mayo and all but they still baned me from the store. As long as they dont keep a list that they share it should be OK for me to go to the Walmart down the road from work in Groganville tho. I dont no if you have different people buy different kind of stuff but Im kinda an expert on whisky so if you had me buy some of that with the money that would be way cool. 


Thanks
Arnold

Note long gap here. I thought they'd realised that Arnold was not the demographic they were pandering to, but almost two weeks later the e-mails started up again. Notice the annoying frequency and repetition - by this time I'd given up checking frequently so a few days' worth had built up by the time I logged on.

messages.subject: Fund For Your First Mystery Shopper Assignment Will Be
messages.body:
Deliver To You Today Via Usps


Attn: Prospective Shopper,


Good Morning, I am emailing you to confirm you will be receiving your First Assignment as a Mystery Shopper this Morning Wednesday 19th May 2010 VIA USPS and I will want you to watch out for it and Follow the Instructions in the envelop and get back to me before time runs out with all Reports and Informations. 


You will receive this twice a week so please avoid any delay and get this done with no delay so we can proceed on Next Assignment.

Hubert Duke

messages.body:
Hi Hubert


So theres been a bit of a mix up on this end. The money showed up in my bank acount this mornin so I took the cash out then went on down to the Walmart in Groganville after work like I said I was goin to. So I was ridin with my buddy Jake cuz my trucks fuel pump is toast right now, and we both went in to the Walmart cuz he needs some more slim jims and chewin tobaco. So were in line for the Western Union thing, but I was chewin on some of Jakes tobacco and you know how it is, it really loosens your guts up. There was a long line so I left Jake holdin my place while I went to drop the kids off at the pool, but when I gets back this skinny dude starts gettin all in my face about cuttin in line. I told him hed better watch his mouth or Id open up a can of whoopass on him, but he wasnt gonna listen. The dude was crazy, probly some meth head or somethin. Anyway I popped him real good in the mouth and he went down, but next thing I now the security shows up with the cops and I get arested. So if you want your report on the Walmart, Id say it sucks, becuse its bullshit that they arest me just for defendin myself against some crazy guy whos all up in my face and everythin. But it took me $500 to bond out of jail. Just sayin... sorry about that, but Im good for the rest of the money. What do yall want me to do with it? I could try again to send it like it said in the papers you gave me, or I could spend it on some good whisky and send you back a report on that if you like.


Thanks


Arnold
messages.raw:
Arnold Wanker

Date: Mon 5/24/2010 4.35 PM

Hi Hubert

So theres been a bit of a mix up on this end. Anyway I popped him real good in the mouth and he went down, but next thing I now the security shows up with the cops and I get arested. So if you want your report on the Walmart, Id say it sucks, becuse its bullshit that they arest me just for defendin myself against some crazy guy whos all up in my face and everythin. But it took me $500 to bond out of jail. Just sayin... sorry about that, but Im good for the rest of the money. What do yall want me to do with it? I could try again to send it like it said in the papers you gave me, or I could spend it on some good whisky and send you back a report on that if you like.

messages.subject: Urgent & Make Sure You Complete Your Assignment Today
messages.body:
Hello


Thanks for the update regarding your first assignment, we want you to take it easy with people ok


You are advice deduct your $200 and $20 for Transportation and transfer the rest of the funds to Sam Henry In Dubai Uae through western union today, Make sure all Reports And information's are sent in full about the Western Union you go to today and make sure its a different one that you have not been to.


As soon as you have done this, You are to e-mail me the following information below:


1,The name and address of the sender(which is surpose to be you)
2,The  MTCN of the transaction(10 digit)
3,The amounts to be received after western union charges


I)How long it took you to complete the Wal-Mart/ Western Union location  services.
ii) Name of the agent / his or her attitude towards customers.
iii)Poor working skills and customer relation
iv) Slow services and cleanliness of the establishment.


The above information is needed as soon as you read this email . Upon confirming the above information, you will be promptly updated on the next course of assignment we have for you..


Hope all is clear?


We look forward to establish a long term business relationship with you.
Hubert Duke

Huber Duke

messages.body:
Hi Hubert


Thanks for bein so understandin. Dont get me wrong, it aint like I go out there lookin for no trouble or nothin, its just that when some peckerhead like that gets all up in my face and everythin, I aint gonna just stand there and take it like some big wuss. Anyhow, the thing is, it messed my sholder up pretty good when that bigass security guy took me to the ground yesterday. Seein as I got hurt while I was workin for you and all, is there any chance of workmens comp or anythin? Its just that the tire retread factory dont give me no health insurance or nothin, so it would be really cool of you if youd come through and help me out. I was gonna go and get a scan taken to make sure nothins broken, but I wanted to make sure its OK that I use your name for them to bill it to first. 


Let me know what you think. Ill try to get the funds out today but Im still pretty drowsy what with the pain pills Im takin for my sholder and all.


Thanks


Arnold

Hi Hubert,


I got your message, and I understand about the whole Western Union thing and everythin. I gotta tell you tho, my sholder is killin me right now. Trouble is the clinic aint gonna do any scans or anythin without insurance or me payin them up front. messages.body:
Hi Hubert,


OK, so I went to the clinic this mornin. They took a bunch of Xrays of my sholder and the doctor said it aint broke but theres some damage to the liggiments or somethin. They charged me $340 total so it didnt even come to the $500 you said, but I apreciate your generosity and all. I tell ya, it feels good workin for someone that actually gives a damn about his people, cuz the tire retread factory dont give a crap as long as your there and runnin the tires thru the machines. Speakin of which, I gots to go, cuz I still have to go into the factory this afternoon. Im an ass hair from gettin canned right now after they found out about me and Jake pranking this tool that works there by fillin his mayo bottle in the fridge with Astroglide. Ill try to find another Walmart after work... kinda obvius, but the one in Groganville done baned me also now. 


Thanks 


Arnold

messages.body:
Hi Hubert


So Ive been gettin calls from the bank all this mornin. They called me three times on my cell already today. I didnt pick it up cuz I was workin, but the bank manger left mesages sayin that I urgently need to come in and not to spend any of the money I took out on Monday. Any idea whats goin on? Im kinda worried about the whole thing, cuz I done spent some of the money anyway on the scans and all, and seein as Im workin for you and everything, I wanted your advice on iffen I should go and talk to the bank manger. Anyway, just to let you know Im holdin off sendin the rest of the money til I hear from you.


Thanks


Arnold

messages.body:
Hubert,


Im sendin this email from Jakes place. I was hangin out at the 7-11 and fixin to go into the factory when Jake called me on my cell and told me the cops are out lookin for me. Then the bank called and said theres an arest warant out for me cuz I never came in after they was callin me yesterday. Im gonna borow my uncles truck and skip town for a while until all this blows over. I can hop the border into Tenesee and hang out with my cusin in Klan Hollow for a few days. Thing is, Im gonna need some gas and food money while were on the road. Once I get there I can try and find a Walmart and wire you the rest of the cash if you like. I just wanted to tell you I was goin to be out of town, so dont send another payment to my house or nothin. 


Thanks
Arnold


PS I dont supose you can wire me some more cash for travelin money can you? About $500 would be plenty. Im good for it, my cusins pretty flush so Ill borow from him then send your cash back to you as soon as I get to Klan Hollow.
